sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR , A.ITEM_GRP_ID , B.ITEM_GRP_NM , A.ITEM_ID , A.ITEM_NM , A.SORT_ORDER , COUNT(A.ITEM_GRP_ID) OVER(PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.ITEM_GRP_ID ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER) AS GROUP_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.ITEM_GRP_ID ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER, A.SORT_ORDER) AS GROUP_INDEX FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM A INNER JOIN BSC_LEVEL_ITEM_GRP B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_GRP_ID = B.ITEM_GRP_ID AND B.DELETE_DT IS NULL WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.ITEM_GRP_ID = #findItemGrpId# ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER, A.SORT_ORDER
SELECT ITEM_GRP_ID, ITEM_GRP_NM FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM_GRP WHERE YEAR = #year# AND DELETE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY SORT_ORDER
SELECT YEAR , ITEM_ID , ITEM_GRP_ID , ITEM_NM , CONTENT , GRADE_BASIS , SORT_ORDER FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT 'K'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(ITEM_ID,2,6)),0)+1,6,'0') SEQ FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM
INSERT INTO BSC_LEVEL_ITEM ( YEAR , ITEM_ID , ITEM_GRP_ID , ITEM_NM , CONTENT , GRADE_BASIS , SORT_ORDER , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #SEQ# , #itemGrpId# , #itemNm# , #content# , #gradeBasis# , #sortOrder# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BSC_LEVEL_ITEM SET ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId# , ITEM_NM = #itemNm# , CONTENT = #content# , GRADE_BASIS = #gradeBasis# , SORT_ORDER = #sortOrder# , MODIFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_ID = #itemId#
DELETE FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_ID = #itemId#
